review: I'm loving my Roku so far. I just plugged it into my TV's HDMI port and the power cable that comes out of the Roku goes into your TV's USB port (that powers the unit so no need to plug it into a wall jack).  It uses your wireless network connection. To set it up you will need to create an online Roku account on their website first (it's FREE) and then when you plug it in for the first time it will run you through an easy setup process where you can enter your wireless user and password, etc. It was very easy to set up.Works great for me.
